document.masterDocTitle: Nomenclatural Studies Toward a World List of Diptera Genus-Group Names Part VII: Johann Wilhelm Meigen

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Nomenclatural Studies Toward a World List of Diptera Genus-Group Names Part VII: Johann Wilhelm Meigen

heading.emphasis: Index of Diptera Species-Group Names Proposed by Meigen

subSubSection.paragraph: Date letters correspond to the date-letter combination in the References. Authorship is Meigen alone unless otherwise specified. Species-group names are given verbatim in their original combination (whether the genus-group name was misspelled or not). Species-group names in italics are unavailable names. Dates and date-letters refer to the first appearance of the name in the published literature. Some secondary references are included in cases where a name is more commonly known from that later publication, or if a name was made available first from a plate, whereas the secondary publication had the description.
